solution_line_template: Since there are {months_per_quarter} months in a quarter, then there are {months_per_year}/{months_per_quarter} = <<{months_per_year}/{months_per_quarter}={quarters_per_year}>>{quarters_per_year} quarters in a year.
So, Mrs. Garcia pays ${quarterly_payment} x {quarters_per_year} = $<<{quarterly_payment}*{quarters_per_year}={annual_payment}>>{annual_payment} in a year for her insurance.
